>
[Adrenaline Rush](/Feats.aspx?ID=1602) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength. While you are raging, increase your encumbered and maximum Bulk limits by 2; you also gain a +1 status bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to lift heavy objects, [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), and [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34).
name: Adrenaline Rush
